abstract: The push to make MF Global customers nearly whole, a goal now surprisingly within reach, is a remarkable turnaround for the brokerage firm.
snippet: The push to make MF Global customers nearly whole, a goal now surprisingly within reach, is a remarkable turnaround for the brokerage firm.
lead_paragraph: When Mahesh Desai checked his MF Global account 15 months ago, his $580,000 nest egg was gone.

headline.main: MF Global’s Bankruptcy Nears a Happy Conclusion
headline.print_headline: MF Global’s Bankruptcy Near Happy Conclusion

abstract: One of Wall Street’s relative minnows is getting a whale-size paycheck. The Jefferies Group is paying its boss, Richard B. Handler, $19 million for the year to November 2012.
snippet: One of Wall Street’s relative minnows is getting a whale-size paycheck. The Jefferies Group is paying its boss, Richard B. Handler, $19 million for the year to November 2012.
lead_paragraph: One of Wall Street’s relative minnows is getting a whale-size paycheck. The Jefferies Group is paying its boss, Richard B. Handler, $19 million for the year to November 2012.

headline.main: The Rich Math Behind the Handler Handout
